name: storage-keeper
description: Keeper for handling browser and node storages

scripts.flow-coverage: node node_modules/flow-coverage-report/bin/flow-coverage-report.js -f "node node_modules/flow-bin/vendor/flow" -i "./src/**/*.js*" -t html -t text -t json -o tests_results/coverage/flow
scripts.develop: node node_modules/rollup/bin/rollup --config ./rollup.config.develop.js --watch | browser-sync start --server dev --host 0.0.0.0 --port=8080 --open local --files ./dev/index.build.js
scripts.precommit: npm run js-lint && npm run flow && npm run test && npm run build && npm run test-bundle

author: Michal Ozog√°n <michal@ozogan.eu>
